greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Compound filter: a(n) = P(A003557(n), A048250(n)), where P(n,k) is sequence A000027 used as a pairing function.
comment: A000203 (sigma(n)) is a function of this sequence, because formula
can be rewritten as a relation:
where A057521(n) = A064549(A003557(n)), thus A000203(n) is a function of A003557(n) and A048250(n), the values that are packed here into a(n).
A001615 (Dedekind's psi) is a function of this sequence, because it can be written as A001615(n) = A003557(n)*A048250(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A003557(n) = n/factorback(factor(n)[, 1]); \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Nov 17 2014
A048250(n) = if(n<1, 0, sumdiv(n, d, if(core(d)==d, d)));
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Sep 04 2017
